name: Narwhal Grappling Hook
description: Join the Happy Narwhal in the amazing reaction-based adventure to get the highest score in the Cloudrealm. Control him using the force of the Gravity! Hold your finger on a cloud to create a rope between the Happy Narwhal and the cloud. Try to time the release of your finger with the velocity of the Narwhal! Grab the magic coins to get a speed up. Try to make him go fast and high! Don't allow him to go outside of the borders. Be amazed by the beautiful rainbow colors!
